attributes.action: Legislation to ensure only law abiding people can purchase or run Mobile Home Retirement Parks and cap pitch fees to a sensible price per week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unscrupulous mobile home park owners are making life impossible for elderly residents. They are allowed to put up the pitch fee every year by the rate of inflation. This has resulted in charges per month being more than paying a mortgage. Does the Government want the elderly retired people on these sites to be able to afford to live there or do they want them to be a burden on the state either by claiming more benefits or moving into council property.
